title: Lost Disappearance
story: In the small town of Ravensdale, a young girl named Sarah Miller has mysteriously disappeared.
Sarah was last seen leaving her house on Park Street to walk to school, but she never made it to school that day.
Neighbors reported seeing a suspicious looking man lurking around the neighborhood around the time Sarah disappeared.
The police have launched an investigation, but they have no leads on Sarah's whereabouts.

suspect.name: John Lawson
suspect.alibi: John claims he was at work during the time Sarah disappeared.
suspect.confirmation: John's supervisor confirmed that he was indeed at work during the time of the disappearance.

witness.name: Mrs. Johnson
witness.observation: Mrs. Johnson claims she saw Sarah getting into a dark-colored car with a man.
witness.description: She described the man as tall, with a beard and sunglasses.

npcs.name: Officer Roberts
npcs.dialogue: I've been on the force for over 10 years but I've never seen a disappearance like this. We're doing everything we can to find Sarah.

npcs.name: Mr. Miller
npcs.dialogue: My daughter is a good student who never causes any trouble. I just want her back.

clues.note: A note found in Sarah's bedroom mentions meeting someone at the town park after school.
clues.footprints: Large footprints found near the park that do not match Sarah's or any known suspects.
clues.abandoned shack: An abandoned shack on the outskirts of town contains clothes that match Sarah's description.
clues.mysterious phone call: A neighbor claims to have heard a man shouting on the phone the night before Sarah disappeared.
